title: Jack
description:
Jack was created as a submission to Scream Roulette 2025. I worked on it alone, and the game was completed within a rough time frame of 12 hours. Since I'm very interested in the horror games scene and always have been, I decided to take a shot at it by creating this small blackjack game based on mechanics from Balatro and Buckshot Roulette.

  • Game design and programming
  • Dealer art
  • Scene composition
  • Jumpscare animation
  • Year: 2025
  • Platform: PC
  • Engine: Unity
